document.full_text: passengers who expected to take a 55-minute flight from san antonio to houston on thursday spent more than three hours on the tarmac after a chemical odor forced the plane to make an emergency landing.
document.title: plane makes emergency landing in san antonio
lines_and_colors: passengers who expected to take a 55-minute flight from san antonio to houston on thursday spent more than three hours on the tarmac after a chemical odor forced the plane to make an emergency landing.
